name: Timothee
description:
A short narrative horror game created by a two man team in 48 hours for the SA GAME JAM 2021 with the theme THE URGE TO DISCOVER.

Play as Timothee who braves his fear of the dark in search of his missing Father. As you go deeper, the more you discover about your Father's desperate attempts to bring his wife back from the dead. 

Credits:
Nix Baalbergen:https://nixbee.wixsite.com/artofnixbee
Morne Gouws:https://mrngouws.wixsite.com/my-site

(Every line of code and art asset has been custom made. Only base unity with no packages or extensions and photoshop 2019 was used to create this game. All audio is royalty free from the website mixkit.co)
